articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: Threads is testing spoiler text, Zuckerberg says - TechCrunch
articles.description: Threads, Meta's microblogging platform, is testing spoiler text. This is a nice quality-of-life upgrade on the user side, but it also helps Meta by encouraging more conversations about pop culture without people worrying about spoiling others.
articles.content:
Threads, Meta’s microblogging platform, is testing spoiler text, according to a post from Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg.
Spoiler text refers to words (or images) that are grayed out in a post and only be… [+1214 chars]
